New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/217/2007-Admn: February 04, 2008 PQLICY MATTERS ADMINISTRATIONIFINANCE (23/2008) (Decision taken on 10" Weekly Meeting dated 02.01.2008) Sub: Guidelines for issue of inspection notes by officials after site visitltour: Keeping in view some instances where officers in their inspection notes have given   remarks on the field not related to their official   jurisdiction, it has been decided to streamline guidelines for issuance of inspection note by officials after tour: 2_ The following guidelines may be adhered to while issuing inspection notes after site visitltour: Inspection notes after site visitltours can be issued by GM level and higher officers after appropriate approval: ii) The inspection notes be carefully worded and should not infringe on the jurisdiction of other division: (iii) In case , any observation about the works of other divisions is to be made_ the same may be informed to the concerned Member confidentially for taking appropriate action as deemed fit by him. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: (L P Padhy) DGM (Admn:) To: 1.
